data.name: 0000 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, brigade chief.

data.name: 0001 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh, it's pretty rare for you to refer to me that way.

data.name: 0002 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's only because the mood is right, and it's fitting for what I want to talk about.

data.name: 0003 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, it's just… There's something I want to ask you, as brigade chief.

data.name: 0004 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Can't we do this later? We're busy right now.

data.name: 0005 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, don't say that.

data.name: 0006 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What I want to ask, is whether anyone will ever inherit the brigade chief title.

data.name: 0007 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's obviously no way that's going to happen.

data.name: 0008 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's only one SOS Brigade Chief! It's impossible for it to be anyone but me.

data.name: 0009 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That might be true, but…

data.name: 0010 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We applied to the school as an interest club and stuff.

data.name: 0011 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, not that we were accepted.

data.name: 0012 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And then next year we might have new students join, right?

data.name: 0013 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though if you asked me, I'd deny any possibility of that.

data.name: 0014 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's more—eventually we'll graduate and have to leave.

data.name: 0015 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What are you going to do about the remaining SOS Brigade then?

data.name: 0016 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right… Well at that point the SOS Brigade will have expanded worldwide and stuff.

data.name: 0017 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0018 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We could always leave them with this place as the SOS Brigade birthplace.

data.name: 0019 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But at that time we'll probably need…

data.name: 0020 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …to choose a successor carefully.

data.name: 0021 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course, I'll need to personally hold interviews…

data.name: 0022 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …to pick out the perfect candidate.

data.name: 0023 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But then, I'm not sure if someone who can live up to my standard even exists.

data.name: 0024 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, is that right.

data.name: 0025 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder if she'll still be dragging me around, working me to death by then.

data.name: 0026 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't want to think about it too much…

data.name: 0027 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya!

data.name: 0028 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm? What is it, Mikuru?

data.name: 0029 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, the, umm…

data.name: 0030 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What did you suddenly call me for?

data.name: 0031 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-uhh…

data.name: 0032 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Just spit it out! If there's something you want to say, then get straight to the point!

data.name: 0033 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-it's just…

data.name: 0034 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what do you need to do to become brigade chief?!

data.name: 0035 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Huh?

data.name: 0036 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what? Was that maybe a weird thing to ask?!

data.name: 0037 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmmm… So you wanna become brigade chief?

data.name: 0038 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a surprisingly bold thing for you to say, Mikuru

data.name: 0039 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh, no, i-it's not like that—

data.name: 0040 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine, I'll tell you.

data.name: 0041 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0042 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In order to become the SOS Brigade's brigade chief, you have to…

data.name: 0043 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You have to…

data.name: 0044 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, you at least have to defeat me!

data.name: 0045 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eek?! Defeat you?!

data.name: 0046 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course!

data.name: 0047 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In ancient Rome, you had to defeat the emperor to become the new emperor!

data.name: 0048 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhhh?!

data.name: 0049 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The SOS Brigade works the same!

data.name: 0050 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll only let those whose strength I've tested myself become our next brigade chief.

data.name: 0051 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Having said that—I'll accept your challenge whenever you want, Mikuru.

data.name: 0052 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't particularly wa—

data.name: 0053 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh yeah! Call Koizumi and Yuki over and we'll have a tournament!

data.name: 0054 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm just kidding about all that.

data.name: 0055 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The status of SOS Brigade Chief—it's a unique and irreplacable way of being.

data.name: 0056 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Of course. I understand.

data.name: 0057 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What is an SOS Brigade Chief?

data.name: 0058 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a strange thing for you to ask, Yuki.

data.name: 0059 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'm deeply interested in what kind of being it is.

data.name: 0060 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, right. Well if I were to sum it up…

data.name: 0061 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's me, Haruhi Suzumiya.

data.name: 0062 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The objective of the SOS Brigade is to greatly liven up the world.

data.name: 0063 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why? Because I want to have fun.

data.name: 0064 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Our goal is to collect all the mysteries of the world and bring them to me one after another!

data.name: 0065 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I think doing so will make our society way way more fun.

data.name: 0066 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Got that?

data.name: 0067 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I understand the objective.

data.name: 0068 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright, great. So do your best as a Brigade Member, okay, Yuki?

data.name: 0069 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0070 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I've wanted to ask something for a while.

data.name: 0071 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What is it, Koizumi?

data.name: 0072 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Your prospects, or rather the future of the SOS Brigade Chief.

data.name: 0073 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, I see. Certainly you would be curious, as a Brigade Member.

data.name: 0074 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes. If I can, I'd like to continue my activity within the SOS Brigade for as long as possible.

data.name: 0075 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a great attitude.

data.name: 0076 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, if I had to sum it up… Maybe world expansion.

data.name: 0077 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: World expansion… is it?

data.name: 0078 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yep. Right now we're still only using North High and the surrounding area.

data.name: 0079 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From here on out I'd like to expand our area bit by bit. Firstly, mainland Japan.

data.name: 0080 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From there on, I plan to continue to spread our activities around the world.

data.name: 0081 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Worldwide… What else should I expect of Miss Suzumiya? Such greater vision than any of us.

data.name: 0082 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But just being active means nothing.

data.name: 0083 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The important thing is to go to confirm the mysteries of the world.

data.name: 0084 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I—the SOS Brigade Chief—will confirm the mysteries of the world with my own eyes.

data.name: 0085 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The world will be way more interesting and fun if we do!

data.name: 0086 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I didn't realise you had such magnificent plans.

data.name: 0087 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With that being said, Koizumi…

data.name: 0088 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I hope you continue your outstanding services from here on out!

data.name: 0089 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I'm prepared to give it my all.

data.name: 0090 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good answer. That's why you're an SOS Brigade Member after all.
